posts.post_title: 7 SGC Graded Old Judge Cards SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Cy
Hi,



I have a group of 7 Old Judge Baseball Cards For Sale. I am selling these cards as a group. This is a very nice group with strong pictures. This is a nice way to pick up 7 scarce cards at once.



If you would like to buy them, you can contact me at:



cy@cyscards.com



Here is the list of cards.



Click on any underlined player to see a picture of that card.

===============================================================

Thank you.



Cy
